system.effect: Captain can Sacrifice Crew Population to boost morale. When used, reduce crew population by 1 to increase morale by 2. Can be done once per day. No Poor Craftsmanship. Good provides +5 to all command tests on the vessel, Best also raises morale by 3 instead of 2. Only one per vessel.
